projects.name: CDN Deployment
projects.description: Design deployment and bundling strategy for react applications
details: Build webpack plugin to exclude predetermined set of dependencies from bundle
Build loader that includes bundle and shared dependencies on webpage

projects.name: Virence Migration
projects.description: Lead project to migrate the frontend codebase of an aquisition to React
details: Introduced around a dozen AngularJS developers to React and our design system
Architected solutions to maintain compatability with preexisting backend

projects.name: Nursing Flowsheets
projects.description: Created a workflow for nurses to document patient assessments
details: Built the first client facing React application in the monolith
Reduced load and render time of data grid by upwards of 90%

projects.name: Messing Operations
projects.description: Maintained message queuing system for sending calls, emails, and SMS to patients
details: Created Grafana dashboards to monitor throughput, analyze bottlenecks, and report metrics
Collaborated with a remote team to migrate messaging infrastructure to a new service provider

projects.name: IdeaLab
projects.description: Modeled customer life cycles to recognize valuable clients
details: Segmented the customer base through statistical analysis and machine learning using R

projects.name: VTeam
projects.description: Designed and implemented a .NET application to view project dependencies using C#
details: Computed module integration complexity using design predicates and reflection
